name: Banshee
tips: Randomly targets one player at the start of the hunt and will only focus them. In multiplayer, will hunt based off INDIVIDUAL sanity, not group average.
Every parabolic microphone interaction has a 33% chance for a unique Banshee scream.
If attempting to complete the "Repel a ghost while it's chasing someone" objective, the "someone" must be the selected target.

name: Demon
tips: Demons have a 20 second hunt cooldown instead of the usual 25.
Smudging a demon (before the hunt) prevents hunts for 60 seconds instead of the usual 90.

name: Deogen
tips: If you're within 1 meter of a Deogen, there is a 33% chance for a unique "bull-like breathing" response.
Deogen's slow the closer to their target they are and ALWAYS knows the locations of players. Run from the Deogen, don't hide.
Deogen's pick the closest target at the start of the hunt. This will occasionally "refresh" and can be forced using a smudge.

name: Goryo
tips: Goryo's D.O.T.S silhouettes can only be seen via a video camera when the ghost room is empty.
A Goryo will never change ghost rooms, no matter the difficulty, unless wished with the monkey paw.
The roaming distance of a Goryo is VERY limited, they will not travel far from the ghost room unless hunting.

name: Hantu
tips: Hantu's move faster in cold rooms and slower in warm rooms.
If the breaker is off, you can see a Hantu's breath during a hunt.
Hantu evidence matches a mimic as well, be sure to check the Spirit Box. If you receive a response, it's a Mimic NOT a Hantu.

name: Jinn
tips: Jinn's will NOT turn off a breaker. However, they can still accidentally overload a breaker and turn it off by turning on a light.
The Jinn's special abilities all players in the same room or within 3 meters will lose 25% of their sanity. The breaker will read 2 or 5 on the EMF.

name: Mare
tips: If the lights are on in the same room as the Mare, the hunt threshold drops to <= 40% sanity.
A Mare will NOT turn on a light, however, they are more likely to trigger a light shatter ghost event.
You can test for a mare by turning a light on and seeing if it immedatiely turns the lights off. There is only a chance for this interaction. Try to pause a few seconds between attempts.

name: Moroi
tips: Moroi's curse the players they respond to on the Spirit Box, doubling their sanity drain rate. You can test for a Moroi by raising your sanity to 100%, entering the location with a lit candle, and receiving a response on the spirit box. If your sanity continues to drain (screen available) or you're able to take another pill (screen broken), it's a Moroi.
Moroi's get faster the lower the sanity value is below 50% from 1.5m/s @ 50% to 2.25m/s @ 5%

name: Myling
tips: Myling's footsteps are harder to detect during a hunt. They can only be heard within 12 meters, getting louder the closer they are.
If the footsteps are only heard when you're on the same floor and close enough to have electronics disrupted, it's likely a Myling.
Myling's are known for interacting with the Parabolic Microphone more often than other ghosts.

name: Obake
tips: An Obake will shapeshift at least once during a hunt, with a standard 6.67% chance of it happening again per "flicker".
Obake's sometimes don't leave fingerprints when interacting and their fingerprints fade faster.

name: Oni
tips: Oni's are more active when people are nearby and drains their sanity faster.
Oni's flicker less than other ghosts during hunts and cannot perform the white smoke ghost event.

name: Onryo
tips: Onyro's can hunt at any sanity after blowing out a candle.
The more dead players the more likely for the Onyro to blow out a flame.
Onryo evidence matches a mimic as well, be sure to check the Spirit Box. If you receive a response, it's a Mimic NOT a Onryo.

name: Phantom
tips: Phantom's fade out longer than other ghosts during a hunt (more than 1 second).
A photo of a Phantom will be labeled "ghost" but the Phantom will not be visible on the picture.
Phantom's drain the sanity of those who look at it at a faster rate.

name: Raiju
tips: Raiju's can hunt at 65% if near active electrical equipment.
Raiju's are more aggressive is near active electrical equipment.
Electrical equipment is powered investigation gear and powered environmental items, such as a light, TV, or breaker.

name: Revenant
tips: Revenant's are slow while searching for a target, but significantly faster once they see their target.
This speed boost lasts until it reaches the point where it last saw it's target

name: Shade
tips: Shades are less likely to interact based on current sanity. This is reduced by 2% per sanity percentage lost. At 50% sanity, there is no penalty to the change of an interaction.
Shades are more likely (67% chance per event) to trigger the ghost mists event or to manifest as a shadow figure.
When a player is in the same room as a Shade it will only interact with Ghost Writing and will not start a hunt. Should the Shade wander out of the room, it can interact and hunt as normal.

name: Spirit
tips: Spirits are a baseline ghost with no distinct strengths.
Spirits are affected by a pre-hunt smudge for 180 seconds, over the normal 90 seconds.

name: Thaye
tips: Thaye's age rapidly. If you check with a Oujia board, you'll see the Thaye age over time. They will get slower and hunt at a lower threshold as they age.
Thaye's will only age every 1-2 minutes IF a player is in the room, otherwise it will check again in 30 seconds.

name: The Mimic
tips: As their name suggests, this ghost can Mimic the abilities of other ghosts and will change many times during the investigation.
Mimic's will ALWAYS present spirit orbs as a piece of evidence, sometimes being the 4th evidence.

name: The Twins
tips: Twin's have a 50% chance to start the hunt in either the ghost room or the room it last had an interaction in using it's ability.
The crucifix must be in the location where the hunt starts.
If the hunt starts outside of the ghost room, the ghost will be slightly faster.

name: Wraith
tips: While NOT hunting Wraith's will sometimes teleport within 3 meters of a random player, triggering an EMF 2 (25% chance for EMF 5) reading at the player.
A wraith will NEVER step in a pile of salt.

name: Yokai
tips: Yokai's become more angry if a player talks near them. This raises the hunt threshold to 80% temporarily.
Yokai's can only hear electronics within 2 meters of it's current location.

name: Yurei
tips: Smudging a Yurei before a hunt will banish it to it's ghost room and trap it for 60 seconds. It can leave for a ghost event, but will return after.
Yurei's ability can drain the sanity of all players within 7.5 meters by 15%.
If there is a door open in it's current room, it will shut one random door fully and present an EMF 2 reading. While all ghosts can do this, a Yurei will do it more often.
